title: Setup project repository
body: Create initial repository structure with README and basic configuration files

title: Design database schema
body: Design and document the database schema for the application

body: Build login and registration functionality with JWT tokens

body: Document all REST API endpoints with examples

title: Bug: Login fails on mobile
body: Users report login button not responding on mobile devices

body: Write comprehensive unit tests for core modules

title: Performance optimization
body: Optimize database queries and API response times

title: User feedback form
body: Create a feedback form for users to submit suggestions
